get.description:
This API defines the mapping between an instance of an OCF Temperature which exposes only a sensor interface
and the AllJoyn Current Temperature interface.
A RETRIEVE on a Temperature Sensor maps to an action on an instance of an Environment.CurrentTemperature Interface.
